name: Ultimate Puzzles Collection
description:
Ultimate Puzzles Collection - this is the first part of a new puzzle series that combines several previously released collections. This collection combines Ultimate Puzzles Animals and Ultimate Puzzles Animals 2, but now with an improved design, a 16:9 aspect ratio and a smaller size.
Choose the animal you like and put it forward. Each puzzle is 4x4 in size, but the complication is that the puzzles need to be rotated in the right direction.
